Getting Traits Associated with Crops from the ICARDA's Genebank Documentation System

getCropTraits.Rd

Return a data frame containing traits associated with a particular crop, their description and related identifiers.

Usage

getCropTraits(crop)

Arguments

crop

character. Crop for which to get available traits.

Value

A data frame with traits that are associated with the crop specified in crop.

Details

getCropTraits returns a data frame of traits together with their IDs and coding system used for each trait.

Possible inputs for crop include:

'ICAG'

Aegilops

'ICB'

Barley

'ICBW'

Bread wheat

'ILC'

Chickpea

'ICDW'

Durum wheat

'ILB'

Faba bean

'BPL'

Faba bean BPL

'IFMI'

Forage and range

'IFLA'

Lathyrus

'ILL'

Lentil

'IFMA'

Medicago annual

'IC'

Not mandate cereals

'IFPI'

Pisum

'ICPW'

Primitive wheat

'IFTR'

Trifolium

'IFVI'

Vicia

'ICWH'

Wheat hybrids

'ICWW'

Wheat wild relatives

'ILWC'

Wild Cicer

'ICWB'

Wild Hordeum

'ILWL'

Wild Lens

'ICWT'

Wild Triticum

A list of available crops to use as input for crop can also be obtained from ICARDA's online server using getCrops.

Author

Khadija Aouzal, Amal Ibnelhobyb, Zakaria Kehel, Fawzy Nawar, Chafik Analy

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
 # Get traits for bread wheat
 breadTraits <- getCropTraits(crop = 'Bread wheat')
} # }
